# Abbreviations {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false
#| output: false

library(here)
source(here::here("R/quarto-setup.R"))
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

quarto_status("drafting")
```

* __MCTQ__: Munich ChronoType Questionnaire
* __MEQ__: Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire 
* __MSF~sc~__: Chronotype proxy. Midpoint between sleep onset and sleep end on work-free days. A sleep correction (SC) is made when a possible sleep compensation related to a lack of sleep on workdays is identified.
* __PRC__: Phase Response Curve
* __SJL__: Social Jetlag
